titles.title: Trafficking Victims Housing Act of 2017
A bill to require a study and report on the housing and service needs of victims of trafficking and individuals at risk for trafficking.
Trafficking Victims Housing Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Trafficking Victims Housing Act of 2017
This bill requires the U.S. Interagency Council on Homelessness, in coordination with other agencies, to conduct a study assessing the availability and accessibility of housing and services for homeless individuals who are victims of trafficking or at risk of being trafficked.
